ComicInfo.Title: The Damned Don't Die
ComicInfo.Summary: The Damned Don't Die: Team 7 are recovered by I.O. and begin to exhibit special powers and abilities from the strange biological agent they were exposed to. Some of them die while some of them thrive and Craven sends the surviving members of the team back into action with their new abilities.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 11:50:01. [Issue ID 55990]
